Summarize simple feature column

Summarize simple feature column

# S3 method for sfc
summary(object, ..., maxsum = 7L, maxp4s = 10L)

Arguments

object

object of class sfc
...

ignored
maxsum

maximum number of classes to summarize the simple feature column to
maxp4s

maximum number of characters to print from the PROJ.4 string

Contents

  • Arguments
